segments.text: Excuse me , sir . Can I look at your ticket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait a minute . I am really sorry but I can't find it now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must have left it somewhere .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe , what shall I do now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I think you should pay upon arrival .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think that's the only thing I can do .
segments.speaker: S2
